verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* these \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w rising|strong="H7925"\w* \w up|strong="H7925"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entrance|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* business \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Of|strong="H4428"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* art thou? \w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: Thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w* seem \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w just|strong="H1697"\w*. \w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w man|strong="H0369"\w* appointed \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thee. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w O|strong="H4310"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H0053"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* business \w might|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w might|strong="H0834"\w* \w do|strong="H4310"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* salute \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w took|strong="H2388"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* heard \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* enticed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w after|strong="H7093"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* David: \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w made|strong="H5087"\w* avow, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Gessur \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* offer sacrifice \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* David \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Go|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w spies|strong="H7270"\w* into \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w As|strong="H8085"\w* soon \w as|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, \w say|strong="H0559"\w* ye: \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* reigneth \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1980"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w two|strong="H3808"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, \w going|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* simplicity \w of|strong="H0376"\w* heart, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w knowing|strong="H3045"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w design|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* Achitophel \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Gilonite|strong="H1526"\w*, \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* counsellor, \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* Gilo. \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w offering|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w strong|strong="H0533"\w* \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w running|strong="H1961"\w* \w together|strong="H3289"\w* increased \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w messenger|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w All|strong="H0376"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H0310"\w* whole \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* followeth \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w flee|strong="H1272"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w escape|strong="H6413"\w* \w else|strong="H6435"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*: \w make|strong="H6965"\w* \w haste|strong="H4116"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w go|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w bring|strong="H4116"\w* ruin \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H0559"\w*, \w we|strong="H0834"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* willingly execute.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w* \w on|strong="H5975"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* afar \w off|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* walked \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bands \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Cerethi, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Phelethi, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Gethites, valiant \w warriors|strong="H0376"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w followed|strong="H7272"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* Geth \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Ethai \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Gethite: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* comest thou \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*? \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* art \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w own|strong="H5973"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w Yesterday|strong="H8543"\w* thou camest, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w be|strong="H3117"\w* forced \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w forth|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*? \w but|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* whither \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w going|strong="H1980"\w*: \w return|strong="H7725"\w* thou, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* shew thee mercy, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* thou hast shewn grace \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w fidelity|strong="H2617"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Ethai \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* liveth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* liveth: \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* soever thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w either|strong="H0518"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Ethai: Come, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H0376"\w* Ethai \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Gethite \w passed|strong="H5674"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H0376"\w*.
